entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 12:30 PM NDT Monday 27 March 2023
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: NNE 15 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries changing to rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 27 March 2023
